title: My friend has serious internet issues playing online
body: It isn't only league, overwatch too. But I thought maybe someone here could help? He regularly disconnects at random times. Claims they've contacted spectrum and spectrum said there was nothing they can do but I find that pretty hard to believe.

replies.body: Get your friend to run a traceroute using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 (if he's also on NA). That'll be the best way for us to see what's going wrong with his connection, so have him take a screenshot of the trace and post it here for me if possible. If not, have him send that trace to our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
